CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL(Status__c,'Under Review'), IF ( OR(On_Under_Review_Total_Days__c <> null,On_Under_Review_Total_Days__c <> 0), (TODAY() - DATEVALUE(On_Under_Review_DurartionDate__c)) + On_Under_Review_Total_Days__c, TODAY() - DATEVALUE(On_Under_Review_DurartionDate__c) ), On_Under_Review_Total_Days__c)
CustomField.label: Under Review Duration
